text:
Was just about to mention this! As someone who enrolled in the course and never ended up taking it, I recently finished the book as well and it really helped me. I guess it is just up to how best you learn (video vs. reading materials). One of the tips is to mix up different learning strategies so who knows, pick up both! 

I do, however, recommend checking out and supporting her through her book if possible!
Kinky is a pretty accurate description of that try down the side with that sweet, sweet high stepping.
